name: manutrackui
description: Welcome to our Manufacturing Track (MT), a cutting-edge solution meticulously designed to revolutionize your inventory operations. Powered by ASP.NET Core 8.0 Razor Pages (C#), MT offers a comprehensive suite of features including Sales, Purchase, Delivery, Goods Receive, Transfer, Adjustment, Return, Scrapping, Stock Count, Transaction Report, Movement Report,Stock Report and manufacturing. Seamlessly manage your warehouse inventory with ease and precision, ensuring optimal stock levels, streamlined workflows, and enhanced productivity.
